document.full_text: yemen's president urged the opposition to join talks in saudi arabia to try to end weeks of turmoil and violence in which at least three more people were killed on tuesday.
document.title: yemen's saleh urges talks in saudi, clashes kill 3
lines_and_colors: yemen's president urged the opposition to join talks in saudi arabia to try to end weeks of turmoil and violence in which at least three more people were killed on tuesday.
